channel.title: Need help (commands)

item.title: Need help (commands)
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[code]this is what came up don’t worry. i’ll figure something out.

src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:28: illegal start of type if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset")) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:28: <identifier> expected if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset")) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:28: ';' expected if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset")) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:28: illegal start of type if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset")) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:28: <identifier> expected if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset")) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:28: ';' expected if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset")) ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:29: illegal start of type c.getItems().addItem(4091, 1); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:29: ';' expected c.getItems().addItem(4091, 1); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:30: <identifier> expected c.getItems().addItem(4093, 1); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:30: ';' expected c.getItems().addItem(4093, 1); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:31: <identifier> expected c.getItems().addItem(4095, 1); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:45: class, interface, or enum exp ected c.getPA().resetAutocast(); ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:46: class, interface, or enum exp ected } ^ src\server\model\players\packets\Commands.java:49: class, interface, or enum exp ected c.playerMagicBook = 0; item.title: Need help (commands)
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Try this;

[code]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.Config;
import server.Connection;
import server.Server;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;
import server.model.players.PlayerHandler;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.world.WorldMap;

/*

  • Commands.java ~ Recoded by Arcik
    */
    public class Commands implements PacketType {

     @Override
 public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
 String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString();
 String[] split = playerCommand.split(" ");
         if(playerCommand.startsWith("players"))
                 c.sendMessage("There are currently "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players on TP2006.");

         if(playerCommand.startsWith("maxcash"))
            c.getItems().addItem(995, 2147000000);
 }
         if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset"))
 c.getItems().addItem(4091, 1);
             c.getItems().addItem(4093, 1);
             c.getItems().addItem(4095, 1);
             c.getItems().addItem(4097, 1);
             c.getItems().addItem(4099, 1);
             c.getItems().addItem(3842, 1);
             c.getItems().addItem(4675, 1);
             c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1);
             c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1);
 		}
         if(playerCommand.startsWith("yell"))
                 c.yell(playerCommand.substring(5));
 		}
         if (playerCommand.startsWith("switch"))
             c.playerMagicBook = 1;
             c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
             c.getPA().resetAutocast();
 		}
 		if (playerCommand.startsWith("switchback"))
             c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
             c.playerMagicBook = 0;
             c.autocastId = -1;
             c.getPA().resetAutocast();
 		}
         if(playerCommand.startsWith("Meleeset"))
                 c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(1725, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(1079, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(1127, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(3842, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(3751, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1);
 		}
         if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
                 if(playerCommand.startsWith("item"))
                           c.sendMessage("We're sorry but, the command item is no longer avaliable due to bugs, sorry!");
 		}                   
         if(playerCommand.startsWith("tele")) {
 				if(split[3] != null) {
                 c.getPA().spellTeleport(Integer.parseInt(split[1]), Integer.parseInt(split[2]), Integer.parseInt(split[3]));       
                 } else {
 				c.getPA().spellTeleport(Integer.parseInt(split[1]), Integer.parseInt(split[2]), 0);                                       
 			}
 		}
 		if(playerCommand.startsWith("rangedset"))
                 c.getItems().addItem(861, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(892, 100);
                 c.getItems().addItem(1725, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2491, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2497, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2503, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1);
 		}
         if(playerCommand.startsWith("mypos") || playerCommand.startsWith("coords"))
                 c.sendMessage("Position: "+c.absX+" "+c.absY+" "+c.heightLevel);
 		}
         if(playerCommand.startsWith("de")) {
                 String msg = c.decrypt(split[1]);
                 c.sendMessage(""+msg);
                 }
         }
 }

}[/code]

Sorry if it does not work. Came out diffrent when I pasted in!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help (commands)
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[code]Listen, this is the problem. whenever i lets say ::runes… it fucking does runes+meleeset+magicset etc. i even placed them in different spots in commands.java and they still do it. here.

[code=]package server.model.players.packets;

import server.Config;
import server.Connection;
import server.Server;
import server.model.players.Client;
import server.model.players.PacketType;
import server.model.players.PlayerHandler;
import server.util.Misc;
import server.world.WorldMap;

/**

  • Commands
    **/
    public class Commands implements PacketType {

    @Override
    public void processPacket(Client c, int packetType, int packetSize) {
    String playerCommand = c.getInStream().readString();
    String[] split = playerCommand.split(" ");
    if(playerCommand.startsWith(“players”))
    c.sendMessage("There are currently “+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount()+ " players on TP2006.”);

     if(playerCommand.startsWith("maxcash"))
 	c.getItems().addItem(995, 2147000000);
 if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset"))
 				c.getItems().addItem(4091, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(4093, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(4095, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(4097, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(4099, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(3842, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(4675, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1);

 if(playerCommand.startsWith("yell"))
 	c.yell(playerCommand.substring(5));

 

 if (playerCommand.startsWith("switch"))
 			//c.playerMagicBook == 0) {
             c.playerMagicBook = 1;
             c.setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
             //c.sendMessage("An ancient wisdomin fills your mind.");
             c.getPA().resetAutocast();

 if (playerCommand.startsWith("switchback"))
             c.setSidebarInterface(6, 1151);
             c.playerMagicBook = 0;
             //c.sendMessage("");
             c.autocastId = -1;
             c.getPA().resetAutocast();
     //c.sendMessage("");
 if(playerCommand.startsWith("Meleeset")) 
                 c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(1725, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(1079, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(1127, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(3842, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(3751, 1);
                 c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1);

 if(c.playerRights >= 0) {
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("item"))
 		//c.getItems().addItem(Integer.parseInt(split[1]), Integer.parseInt(split[2]));
 		  c.sendMessage("We're sorry but, the command item is no longer avaliable due to bugs, sorry!");
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("i"))
 		  c.getItems().addItem(Integer.parseInt(split[1]), Integer.parseInt(split[2]));
 	if (playerCommand.startsWith("setlevel")) {
         try {
             String[] args = playerCommand.split(" ");
             int skill = Integer.parseInt(args[1]);
             int level = Integer.parseInt(args[2]);
             if (level > 99) {
                 level = 99;
             } else if (level < 0) {
                 level = 1;
             }
             c.playerXP[skill] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(level) + 5;
             c.playerLevel[skill] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[skill]);
             c.getPA().refreshSkill(skill);
         } catch (Exception e) {
         }	
    }
    
 		

 if(playerCommand.startsWith("Runes"))
 				c.getItems().addItem(554, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(555, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(556, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(557, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(558, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(559, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(560, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(561, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(562, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(563, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(564, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(565, 10000);
 				c.getItems().addItem(566, 10000);
 				
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("tele")) {
 		if(split[3] != null) {
 			c.getPA().spellTeleport(Integer.parseInt(split[1]), Integer.parseInt(split[2]), Integer.parseInt(split[3]));	
 		} else {
 			c.getPA().spellTeleport(Integer.parseInt(split[1]), Integer.parseInt(split[2]), 0);					
 		}
 	}
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("rangedset"))
 				c.getItems().addItem(861, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(892, 100);
 				c.getItems().addItem(1725, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(2491, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(2497, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(2503, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1);
 				c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1);
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("mypos") || playerCommand.startsWith("coords"))
 		c.sendMessage("Position: "+c.absX+" "+c.absY+" "+c.heightLevel);
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("debug"))
 		c.debug = !c.debug;
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("tasktype"))
 		System.out.println("Task type: "+c.getSlayer().getTaskType(Integer.parseInt(split[1])));
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("song"))
 		c.getPA().song(Integer.parseInt(split[1]));
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("sound"))
 		c.getPA().sound(Integer.parseInt(split[1]));
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("object"))
 		c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(Integer.parseInt(split[1]), c.absX, c.absY, 0, 10);
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("anim"))
 		c.startAnimation(Integer.parseInt(split[1]));
 	if(playerCommand.startsWith("de")) {
 		String msg = c.decrypt(split[1]);
 		c.sendMessage(""+msg);
 	}
 }

    }
    }[/code]

item.dc:creator: @iCharizard iCharizard
item.description:
@iCharizard wrote:

You probably made the wrong number of brackets. 1 too many opening/closing

Using an IDE such an eclipse, or even notepad++ can tell you this.

item.title: Need help (commands)
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

[code]I am having problems with ending a command. When ever i make a command and use it on the server, the rest of the commands below are used all at once. and i cannot end the command by using brackets or i get errors. here’s the command file

if(playerCommand.startsWith("Meleeset")) c.getItems().addItem(4151, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1725, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1079, 1); c.getItems().addItem(1127, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1); c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1); c.getItems().addItem(3842, 1); c.getItems().addItem(3751, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1); //return; if(playerCommand.startsWith("rangedset")) c.getItems().addItem(861, 1); c.getItems().addItem(892, 100); c.getItems().addItem(1725, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2491, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2497, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2503, 1); c.getItems().addItem(3105, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1); if(playerCommand.startsWith("Magicset")) c.getItems().addItem(4091, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4093, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4095, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4097, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4099, 1); c.getItems().addItem(3842, 1); c.getItems().addItem(4675, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2550, 1); c.getItems().addItem(2414, 1); if(playerCommand.startsWith("Runes")) c.getItems().addItem(554, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(555, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(556, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(557, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(558, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(559, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(560, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(561, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(562, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(563, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(564, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(565, 10000); c.getItems().addItem(566, 10000);

When i try adding } to end the command, i get several errors. please help,

Read full topic
